```{r setup, include=FALSE, cache=TRUE, cache.comments=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(plotly)
library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)
data("diamonds")
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
p <- diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(carat, price, color = cut)) +
    geom_point()

ggplotly(p)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
p <- diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(color, fill = color)) +
    geom_bar()

ggplotly(p)
```

### Chart C

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  select(-x, -y, -z) %>% 
  arrange(desc(price)) %>% 
  reactable()
```
